actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to abolish the library of the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Abolishes the library of the House of Representatives. Makes such conforming amendments as necessary. Provides that as soon as practicable after enactment the Speaker of the House of Representatives shall provide for such distribution as he may deem appropriate with respect to books, documents, and other property belonging to the library of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the library of the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
